summary: Provides a MONAI Ignite handler that computes a confusion matrix from model predictions and ground‑truth tensors, updates it batch‑wise, and derives common evaluation scores (e.g., Dice, IoU) with support for per‑class and aggregated reductions across training iterations.
business_intent: Enables automated, continuous assessment of segmentation model performance in medical imaging workflows, allowing developers and clinicians to monitor accuracy metrics during training and validation without manual post‑processing.
